title: [Melgorehn's Reach, Gate House]
description: You are in a cylindrical chamber carved from the stone of the mountain.  Prominent in the center is a large, stone chair with an iron chest next to it. Against the east wall is a raised platform, about 20 feet high, with a wooden battlement on top.

You are in a cylindrical chamber carved from the stone of the mountain.  Prominent in the center is a large, stone chair with an iron chest next to it.  Against the east wall is a raised platform, about 20 feet high, with a wooden battlement on top.
